forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain early. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.
